page.title: 06The Rainford Civic Society.
page.content:
In 1984 the residents of Rainford Junction and Crank founded a group named the Rainford Civic Society. The main aim of the group is improving the amenity and environment of the district. It is an independant non-political, non-profit making charity affiliated to the Civic Trust. It is involved with identifying site and features of environmental importance (e.g.) footpaths and hedgerow. At present it has three major objectives.
Establishing a local history centre.
Advising on planning applications.
Tree and shrub planting schemes.
